original_text: So the Jewish leaders said to each other, ‘Perhaps he means that he will kill himself. He says, “You cannot go where I will go.” Perhaps that is why he says this.’
korean_text: 유대인들이 이르되 그가 말하기를 내가 가는 곳에는 너희가 오지 못하리라 하니 그가 자결하려는가

sentences.original_text: So the Jewish leaders said to each other
Perhaps he means that he will kill himself
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그는 자살할 것이라는 뜻일지도 모른다

sentences.original_text: You cannot go where I will go
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 가는 곳에 갈 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Perhaps that is why he says this
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그것이 그가 이렇게 말하는 이유일 것이다
